name: S.Mohamed Mohideen
summary: Senior Executive - Finance with approximately 6.5 years of corporate experience, strong analytical ability, and proficiency in month-end and year-end processes, accounts payable/receivable, general ledger, and process improvements. Proven ability to meet deadlines and communicate effectively.

experience.title: Senior Executive - Finance
experience.description: Resolving payment issues and ensuring timely payments to vendors (local and foreign); assisting regional accountants for AP/GL/GR/IR related issues; posting admin invoices (Rent, Electricity, Office Maintenance) with cost centre allocation; posting import invoices; single point of contact for related party payments and reconciliations; GR/IR analysis and reporting; updating Forex rates in SAP; bank reconciliations; petty cash management; coordinating with internal and external auditors for audit requirements.

experience.title: Accounts Executive
experience.description: Handling petty cash; preparation of journal vouchers and commission statements; general ledger reconciliation; sundry debtors and creditors analysis; monthly bank reconciliations; inter-branch reconciliations; fixed asset register; vendor payments; MIS reports; internal audit support; cash flow and fund flow preparation; TDS, Service Tax, ESI & PF; monthly book close activities; receipts vs payments analysis.

education.school: Kamaraj College of Arts and Science, affiliated to Manonmaniam Sundaranar University
